"Astarte": "You have met the requirements for your next stamp card. Here you go."
"This card teaches you how to acquire a mag, obtain a free exploration license, and obtain approval to access new areas."
"Your first objective is to complete the Client Order <c bb0000>\"Mag License Application\"<c>."
"Please see Koffie at the Quest Counter to obtain this order."
"Note that your current class level must be 3+ to do so."
"First, please confirm whether or not you've met that requirement."
